content.question: Which of the following would most likely result from the deforestation of large areas of tropical rain forests caused by slash-and-burn agriculture?

choices.label: Increased ozone thinning because of the release of CFCs

Decreased acid rain because of the sequestration of <math alttext="S O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>S</mi><msub><mrow><mi>O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

Increased global temperature because of the release of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>C</mi><msub><mrow><mi>O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>
Deceased evaporation because of the loss of the tree canopy

content.answer: Increased global temperature because of the release of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>C</mi><msub><mrow><mi>O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
